subject: Management
title: Conflict Drives Innovation
description: Learn Conflict Drives Innovation in one minute.

hook.text: Pixar's films are great because every story gets brutally critiqued in their Braintrust meetings.

buildup.text: Without friction between ideas, you get the first draft. First drafts are rarely brilliant.

discovery.text: Constructive conflict forces ideas to evolve. Challenge is the forge where innovation is shaped.

twist.text: Teams that never disagree produce safe, incremental work. Breakthroughs require collisions.

climax.text: Encourage idea conflict deliberately. The best products survive the toughest critiques.

punchline.text: Great ideas aren't born perfect. They're argued into greatness.

quiz.question: How does conflict drive innovation?
options: Challenging ideas forces them to evolve and improve
Innovation happens best when everyone agrees from the start
